body.name: 2FT iPhone Charger Cable, [Apple MFi Certified] 3Pack USB to Lightning Cable for Car Braided, Fast Charging Lightning Cord for iPhone 14 13 12 11 Pro Max Mini 10 8 7 Plus XR XS SE, iPad
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 19 hrs 21 mins
features: 【2.4A Fast Charging】The 2 ft usb to lightning cable are made of high purity copper core and smart intelligent chip with overcharge protection, stable current protection, automatic switching and battery protection.This short phone charging cord supports fast charging (up to 2.4A).

【MFi Certified & Support CarPlay】Certified iphone charger for your lightning devices. Built with original chip promise no warning message pops up, ensures that your lightning devices are loaded and charge safely and faster at maximum speed.

【Ultra Durable】The lightning cable features a sturdy Nylon Braid that protects the internal cable, ensuring longevity, flexibility, and an elegant design surpassing the original. Withstanding over 10,000 plug and unplug cycles, and a remarkable 20,000 bending lifespan, it's built to last. The seamlessly laser-welded connector can handle up to 450lbs of force, making it more durable than other charging cables.

【2FT-Perfect Length】2FT iPhone cable will not tangle or kink, easy to carry and store. This cable is perfect for use inside your car, eliminating the mess of extra wires and keeping your car's interior neat and organized.For use in the office or work area, this medium length cable will provide a stable charging connection for your devices without taking up too much space.

【Wide Compatibility】2 FT iPhone charging cable compatible with all lightning IOS products, such for iPhone 14/14 Plus/14 Pro Max, iPhone 13/12/11/Pro Max/Mini, iPhone XS/XR/X/SE, iPhone 8/7/6/Plus. Also compatible with iPad/iPods and AirPods.
【What you get】3Pack 2Feet USB A to Lightning Braided Cable. All cables you purchase enjoy our 24-month worry-free returns warranty and lifetime 24/7 customer service.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Five-core High-Quality Copper Wire With a lifespan of over 30,000 insertions and removals, our iPhone charger cable ensures the safety of your charging device. It prevents overheating and overcharging during the charging process, taking better care of your phone Premium&Durable materials Improved construction technology and materials with double-layer nylon braiding make our iPhone charger cable last 12 times longer than ordinary ones. It can withstand over 20,000 bends at 90 degrees and support a weight of 80 pounds MFi Certified iphone charger Cable Apple Lightning Cable, no incompatible warning message will pop up! Fully supports iOS versions and all future updates without the charging port getting hot. Fast charging and transfer speed ensures full compatibility with Apple iPhone/iPad/iPod devices!

iPhone charger cable ensures complete charge and sync compatibility with -iPhone 14/ iPhone 14 pro/ iPhone 14pro Max -iPhone 13/ iPhone 13 pro/ iPhone 13 pro Max/iPhone 13 mini -iPhone 12/ iPhone 12 pro/ iPhone 12 pro Max/iPhone 12 mini -iPhone 11/ iPhone 11 pro/ iPhone 11 pro Max/ -iPhone xr/ iPhone xs/ xs max/ iPhone x/ iPhone 10 -iPhone 8s Plus/ iPhone 8/ iPhone 7/ iPhone 7 plus -iPhone 6s Plus/ iPhone 6s/ iPhone 6/ iPhone 6 plus -iPhone 5s / iPhone 5c / iPhone 5/ iPhone SE/ iPhone SE 2th -Airpods / Airpods 2th gen/ Airpods Pro It’s compatible with the lastest Lightning devices.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Item Is As Described
reviews.reviewText: Needed some specific length lightning cables for a charge hub, these were just what we needed. Product received matches the description and seems to work perfectly in the day since we received the shipment. Would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seem to be well made, and good length for my needs
reviews.reviewText: So I needed a quality Lightning cable to charge my iPhone in one of my vehicles. I was using a much longer one that was constantly getting pulled on. But since the phone sits in my console and the charger is only about 12 inches away, this is perfect. To get three for this price is a great value and I threw one in my drone bag to charge my iPad I use for my drone and threw the spare in the vehicle in case I have a problem with the first. Great bargain for three apparently well made short Lightning cables.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Nice cables being used for a charging station. Short length keeps these out of the way. No issues with charging IPads and IPhones. Connectors are good and these seem durable.
